bullet_points: Review the course idea and objectives.

Outline the sequence of modules, explicitly deciding on module order by linking them to progression milestones.
Ensure progression from basic to advanced topics.
Consider including a module dedicated solely to ethical AI practices.

bullet_points: Provide a concise description of what each module covers.

bullet_points: For each hands-on or workshop module, suggest an appropriate duration for exercises.
